item.title: Trump-backed candidate becomes Polish president
item.description: Conservative Karol Nawrocki was inaugurated Wednesday as Poland 's new president, which could set the country on a more nationalist course.

item.title: Texas lawmakers have walked out before
item.description: This is not the first time lawmakers have fled the Texas State Capitol avoid voting on a measure they disagreed with.

item.title: Putin, Trump envoy Witkoff meet ahead of Trump Ukraine war accord deadline
